title: TransactionsRuleDetails
description: A representation of transactions rule details.

field.title: TransactionsRuleField
field.description: Transaction field for which the rule is defined.

type.title: TransactionsRuleType
type.description:
Transaction rule's match type. For TRANSACTION_ID field, EXACT_MATCH is available.
Matches are case sensitive.

query.description: For TRANSACTION_ID field, provide transaction_id. For NAME field, provide a string pattern.
